top.title: Thousands of Epstein documents taken down after victims identified
top.summary: The US Department of Justice faces criticism from victims after names and unredacted images included in latest release.

top.title: Clintons agree to testify in House Epstein probe
top.summary: The couple will appear on two separate days in late February for a deposition after coming to an agreement with the House oversight committee.

top.title: Watch: BBC joins Colombian commandos fighting 'never-ending battle' against drug gangs
top.summary: As the US and Colombian presidents meet, Orla Guerin joins a police unit tasked with finding and destroying jungle cocaine labs.

top.title: X offices raided in France as UK opens fresh investigation into Grok
top.summary: Elon Musk's X and Grok platforms are facing increased scrutiny from authorities on both sides of the channel.

top.title: Musk's SpaceX and xAI merge to make world's most valuable private company
top.summary: Musk says the combined firm - which has been valued at more than $1tn - will be an "innovation engine".

top.title: China bans hidden car door handles over safety concerns
top.summary: It makes China the first country to stop the use of designs first made popular by Elon Musk's Tesla.
